card_text: Apply 1 of these effects. Unless you have a "Vaalmonica" card in your Pendulum Zone, your opponent chooses the effect.$N●Gain 500 LP, then if you have any monsters in your GY that can be Special Summoned, your opponent chooses 1 for you to Special Summon to your field.$N●Take 500 damage, then you can add 1 Level 4 monster from your GY to your hand.$NYou can only activate 1 "Vaalmonica Intonare" per turn.
